publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1087.1 Jeremy Purvis: Dormant Bank and Building Society Accounts Bill - UK Legislationâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1087) in the name of Jim Mather, insert at end "and, in so doing, calls on ministers to return to the Parliament following Royal Assent to the Bill and make a statement that the funds to be distributed in Scotland will be diverted towards youth services and facilities for all parts of Scotland." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
